title.rendered: “IDF Strikes Hezbollah Targets in Southern Lebanon Amid Rising Tensions”

content.rendered:
IDF Spokesperson:

The IDF attacked terrorist targets of Hezbollah in southern Lebanon

Shortly ago, fighter jets attacked a Hezbollah observation post in the Ayta ash-Shab area and Hezbollah’s terrorist infrastructure in the Kfar Kila region of southern Lebanon.

In recent hours, approximately fifteen launches were identified crossing from Lebanon into several areas in the Upper Galilee. Falls were detected in the Yar’on, Yiftah, and Metula areas, with no casualties reported.

Following alerts activated between 15:51-15:53 in the Upper Galilee, several unmanned aerial vehicles were identified crossing from Lebanon, and a fall was detected in the Beit Hillel area, with no casualties reported.

Firefighting teams are currently working to extinguish several fires that broke out as a result of the falls in various areas.

The IDF has shelled several areas from which launches were made into the Upper Galilee.

Attached is documentation of the strikes: https://bit.ly/46rJ1gO
